Reviews.Title: “An unfortunate experience”
Reviews.Author: Bernadette W
Reviews.Content: booked hotel via travel agent 2 days prior cruise days post cruise september 17th 18th october 3rd 4th arrived hotel keys 4 occupied advised occupied clueless confused disrespectful finally awful smell hot water needless trip freezing shower impressed return october 3rd lot smell location excellent accesible banks stores main tourists attractions ie vatican st peters square spanish steps accesible reasonable taxi costs approximately 8 euros recommend hotel hotels proximity redeemable feature fiasco staff angela friendly respectful

Reviews.Title: “Just average perfect”
Reviews.Author: E_Seals
Reviews.Content: perfectly middle staff nice amazing oknothing bad remember perfect whos booking cancelled 1015minutes walk st peter square ladies serving nice especially youre waiting seven oclock morning start

Reviews.Title: “Very good value, good location, clean, friendly”
Reviews.Author: amosy
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights spouse holiday clean functional fancy location historic center rome sights ten minute walk block metro bus stations enjoyed walking basic clean staff friendly helpful breakfast basic completely satisfying altogether definitely enjoyed hotel recommend

Reviews.Title: “An exellent hotel to stay in when in rome”
Reviews.Author: Eyal S
Reviews.Content: hotel location 10min walk vatican main atractions rome stayed 4 nights public transportation day hotel clean staff helpfull welcoming strongly recomend hotel realy worth

Reviews.Title: “Good no frills hotel in fantastic location”
Reviews.Author: AviEli
Reviews.Content: stayed rainy week rome appreciated proximity metro station 2 mins walk line bus stop hotel staff friendly helpful front desk staff english clean bed mattress pillows 5 star hotels ive liked breakfast bit boring adequate quantities shower partition redone water wouldnt leak bathroom floor read wrote noise elevator slept log

Reviews.Title: “CONVIENIENT, INEXPENSIVE, FRIENDLY”
Reviews.Author: lizzard1
Reviews.Content: spent 3 nights elevator didnt hear staff extremely pleasant helpful bit language barrier frills clean comfortable stay third cost name hotels close subway walk vatican breakfast available restaurants close hotel

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel San Valentino
HotelInfo.Address: Via Ezio, 55, 00192 Rome, Italy
